GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
iommu/omap: Fix buffer overflow in debugfs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 9814cc350e0765ce69244bf55ae4c8b29facd27e, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit bd4396f09a4a9e77423e92ec9448217ab46f6edf. For more details please see the references link.
